title: Inland with Sturt
creator_credit: Hugh McInnes, Shan Benson and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The historic journey of explorer Charles Sturt down the Murrumbidgee and Murray Rivers opened up one of the world’s most prosperous fruit and cereal growing areas. The re-enactment of the trip by a group of young Australians, as recorded in this film, was one of the highlights of the Australian Commonwealth Jubilee Celebrations.
